original_text: When Eliab, David’s oldest brother, heard him speaking with the men, he burned with anger at him and asked, “Why have you come down here? And with whom did you leave those few sheep in the wilderness? I know how conceited you are and how wicked your heart is; you came down only to watch the battle.”
korean_text: 큰형 엘리압이 다윗이 사람들에게 하는 말을 들은지라 그가 다윗에게 노를 발하여 이르되 네가 어찌하여 이리로 내려왔느냐 들에 있는 양들을 누구에게 맡겼느냐 나는 네 교만과 네 마음의 완악함을 아노니 네가 전쟁을 구경하러 왔도다

sentences.original_text: When Eliab, David's oldest brother, heard him speaking with the men,
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리압, 다윗의 가장 큰 형이 그가 남들과 말하는 것을 들었을 때,

sentences.original_text: he burned with anger at him
Why have you come down here?
And with whom did you leave those few sheep in the wilderness?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 적은 양들을 황야에 두고 누구와 왔느냐?

sentences.original_text: I know how conceited you are
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네가 얼마나 오만한지 알고 있다

sentences.original_text: and how wicked your heart is;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 마음이 얼마나 악한지 안다;

sentences.original_text: you came down only to watch the battle.
